value: {"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2503.24201v1", "title": "An elementary question of Erd\u0151s and Graham", "summary": "Let $A_k=\\{r(k-r): 1\\leq r \\leq k-1\\}$. Erd\\H os and Graham asked about the\ncardinality of the set of common elements.
